verses.verse: A Psalm of David, to bring to remembrance. O Jehovah <WH3068>, rebuke <WH3198> me not in thy wrath <WH2534>; Neither chasten <WH3256> me in thy hot displeasure <WH2534>.
For thine arrows <WH2671> stick fast <WH5181> in me <WH3027>, And thy hand presseth me sore <WH5181>.
There is no soundness <WH4974> in my flesh <WH1320> because <WH6440> of thine indignation <WH2195>; Neither is there any health <WH7965> in my bones <WH6106> because <WH6440> of my sin <WH2403>.
For mine iniquities <WH5771> are gone over <WH5674> my head <WH7218>: As a heavy <WH3515> burden <WH4853> they are too heavy for me <WH3513>.
My wounds <WH2250> are loathsome <WH887> and corrupt <WH4743>, Because <WH6440> of my foolishness <WH200>.
I am pained <WH5753> and bowed down <WH7817> greatly <WH3966>; I go <WH1980> mourning <WH6937> all the day long <WH3117>.
For my loins <WH3689> are filled <WH4390> with burning <WH7033>; And there is no soundness <WH4974> in my flesh <WH1320>.
I am faint <WH6313> and sore <WH3966> bruised <WH1794>: I have groaned <WH7580> by reason of the disquietness <WH5100> of my heart <WH3820>.
Lord <WH136>, all my desire <WH8378> is before thee <WH585>; And my groaning is not hid from thee <WH5641>.
My heart <WH3820> throbbeth <WH5503>, my strength <WH3581> faileth <WH5800> me <WH216>: As for the light of mine eyes <WH5869>, it <WH1992> also is gone from me <WH369>.
My lovers <WH157> and my friends <WH7453> stand <WH5975> aloof from <WH5048> my plague <WH5061>; And my kinsmen <WH7138> stand <WH5975> afar off <WH7350>.

They also that seek <WH1245> after my life <WH5315> lay snares <WH5367> for me <WH1875>; And they that seek my hurt <WH7451> speak <WH1696> mischievous things <WH1942>, And meditate <WH1897> deceits <WH4820> all the day long <WH3117>.
But I <WH2795>, as a deaf man <WH8085>, hear not <WH483>; And I am as a dumb man that openeth <WH6605> not his mouth <WH6310>.
Yea <WH376>, I am as a man that heareth <WH8085> not <WH6310>, And in whose mouth are no reproofs <WH8433>.
For in thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah, do I hope <WH3176>: Thou wilt answer <WH6030>, O Lord <WH136> my God <WH430>.
For I said <WH559>, Lest they rejoice <WH8055> over me <WH7272>: When my foot slippeth <WH4131>, they magnify themselves against me <WH1431>.
For I am ready <WH3559> to fall <WH6761>, And my sorrow <WH4341> is continually before me <WH8548>.
For I will declare <WH5046> mine iniquity <WH5771>; I will be sorry <WH1672> for my sin <WH2403>.
But mine enemies <WH341> are lively <WH2416>, and are strong <WH6105>; And they that hate <WH8130> me wrongfully <WH8267> are multiplied <WH7231>.
They also that render <WH7999> evil <WH7451> for good <WH2896> Are adversaries <WH7853> unto me <WH7291>, because I follow the thing that is good <WH2896>.
Forsake <WH5800> me not <WH3068>, O Jehovah: O my God <WH430>, be not far from me <WH7368>.
Make haste <WH2363> to help <WH5833> me <WH136>, O Lord, my salvation <WH8668>.
